1.name: AR-23 Liberator
1.desc: The SEAF standard assault rifle, balancing power, fire rate, and weight for a reliable weapon against smaller targets.

1676113140.name: AR-23P Liberator Penetrator
1676113140.desc: A modified Liberator featuring a scope and firing armor-piercing rounds, to help users take down armored targets.

376039023.name: AR-23C Liberator Concussive
376039023.desc: A modified Liberator featuring explosive rounds and a red-dot sight. Trades increased damage for increased recoil.

2088854385.name: SG-8 Punisher
2088854385.desc: A powerful dual magazine pump-action shotgun, with limited armor penetration. Ideal for small and fast targets.

3955657629.name: SG-8P Punisher Plasma
3955657629.desc: A modified Punisher shotgun firing exploding plasma rounds. Fire carefully - exploding plasma can injure squadmates.

2246547985.name: SG-8S Slugger
2246547985.desc: A modified Punisher shotgun firing heavy, high-damage slug rounds. Perfect for punching holes in big targets.

1182300424.name: SG-225 Breaker
1182300424.desc: A fully-automatic shotgun with a high rate of fire, excellent for controlling crowds. Requires frequent reloading.

3068666625.name: SG-225IE Breaker Incendiary
3068666625.desc: A modified Breaker shotgun firing incendiary projectiles. Generates heat during use, so limited to burst fire.

3814689025.name: SG-225SP Breaker Spray&Pra
3814689025.desc: A modified Breaker shotgun firing birdshot, small pellets which saturate an area to clear up smaller targets.

999487482.name: ARC-12 Blitzer
999487482.desc: This shotgun blasts a wide burst of high-voltage electricity that arcs between all units - enemy or otherwise - within range.

2821209932.name: SMG-37 Defender
2821209932.desc: A high-caliber submachine gun which can be fired with one hand. Has a relatively low rate of fire.

2307301438.name: R-63 Diligence
2307301438.desc: This high-caliber marksman rifle trades magazine capacity and rate of fire for powerful, accurate shots.

924530093.name: R-63CS Diligence Counter Sniper
924530093.desc: A modified Diligence rifle offering increased damage, but a reduced rate of fire. Fires a single bullet at a time.

3866352840.name: LAS-5 Scythe
3866352840.desc: A laser rifle firing a continuous beam. Does not need reloading, but if it overheats a new heat sink must be fitted.

1794436168.name: LAS-16 Sickle
1794436168.desc: A laser rifle, firing in short bursts. Does not need reloading, but if it overheats a new heat sink must be fitted.

925809350.name: PLAS-1 Scorcher
925809350.desc: A plasma rifle, firing a bolt of superheated gas which explodes on impact. Avoid standing in proximity to the blast.

2121387072.name: JAR-5 Dominator
2121387072.desc: Firing jet-propelled rounds, the Dominator trades fire rate and magazine capacity for increased damage per projectile.
